de.fh_erfurt.cst.model

Class StatisticModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.fh_erfurt.cst.model.StatisticModel

  • public class StatisticModel
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which encapsules actions with the data connected with the creation of statistics for the training

    • Constructor Detail

      • StatisticModel

        public StatisticModel(Context context,
              VarStore.ProblemType problemType)
        Creates an instance of the statistic model for the specified problem type.
        Parameters:
        context - the current context
        problemType - the problem type this instance shall handle

    • Method Detail

      • addResult

        public void addResult(boolean result,
             int level)
        Report the data of an user answer which is relevant for the statistic
        Parameters:
        result - Was the answer right or wrong?
        level - What was the level of the calculated problem?

      • getStatistic

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> getStatistic()
        Reads out the database and returns the data relevant for the creation of the statistic table.
        Returns:
        a list of string arrays with date (0), number of problems calculated this day (1), the average level (2) and the percentage of right answers (3)

      • exportCSV

        public boolean exportCSV()
        Exports the statistic into an CSV file on the external storage.
        Returns:
        true if operation was successful, otherwise false

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Deletes the entries in the database for the current problem type.

        private Cursor getStatisticData()
